name: 0.5 A Presses
description:
Inspired by the famous "0.5 A Presses" video, this is a platformer where every button can only be pressed 0.5 times-you can press it, or release it, but not both!

This game was made in Phaser 2 for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2018. A WebGL-enabled browser is required to play (any recent version of Chrome or Firefox should work).
